Name: FlowSampler
Query: {update Status:?[flowCount>0;`OK;`FAIL] from raze {([]tableName:x;flowCount:exec counter from select counter:count i from x)} each x}

Name: T1Sampler
Query: {update Status:?[rowCount>0;`OK;`FAIL] from raze {([]tableName:x;rowCount:exec counter from select counter:count i from x where date in {x+neg[1 2 3 1 1 1 1]x mod 7}[.z.D])} each x}
